title: Help please
content:
Hi, I have got 37** rank by studing 2023-2024 cutoff it seems like ece in ec campus is the place to land so how is ece in ec campus?? 

Thank you for your replies.

comments.body: Great just go ahead and join it.
Dont join bro. join CSE or CSE-AIML at RR campus
My only good option is this!!
Work hard in first year get good cgpa , switch streams and campus based on only cgpa üëçget 8.3+ to get cse in ec and 9+ for rr
Yo bro. Don't fret. Go join some other university. Save you money and mental health.
